Package fr.ensibs.ecommerce.utils.cart

Class Cart

java.lang.Object
fr.ensibs.ecommerce.utils.cart.Cart
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cart extends Object implements Serializable
A shopping cart is a list of shopping cart items.

    • setCustomer

      public void setCustomer(Customer customer)

      public CustomerOrder getCustomerOrder()

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Product product) throws Exception
      Adds a shoppingCartItem to the ShoppingCart's items list. If item of the specified product already exists in shopping cart list, the quantity of that item is incremented.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product that defines the type of shopping cart item
      Throws:
      Exception - if the product is null or if the product does not exist in the database
      See Also:
      • CartItem
      • Product

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(Product product) throws Exception
      Removes the ShoppingCartItem of the specified product from the ShoppingCart's items list.
      Parameters:
      product - the Product that defines the type of shopping cart item
      Throws:
      Exception - if the product is null or if the product does not exist in the database
      See Also:
      • CartItem
      • Product

    • update

      public void update(int productId, int quantity) throws Exception
      Updates the ShoppingCartItem of the specified product to the specified quantity. If '0' is the given quantity, the ShoppingCartItem is removed from the ShoppingCart's items list.
      Parameters:
      productId - the Product that defines the type of shopping cart item
      quantity - the number which the ShoppingCartItem is updated to
      Throws:
      Exception - if the product is null or if the product does not exist in the database or if the quantity is greater than the base quantity of the product
      See Also:
      • CartItem
      • Product

    • increaseQuantity

      public void increaseQuantity(Product product) throws Exception
      Increases the quantity of the item with the given id by 1 and updates the total cost. And calculates the total cost of the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      product - : the product of the item to increase the quantity of
      Throws:
      Exception - if the given product is null or if the given quantity is null or negative

    • decreaseQuantity

      public void decreaseQuantity(Product product) throws Exception
      Decreases the quantity of the item with the given id by 1 and updates the total cost. And calculates the total cost of the shopping cart. If the quantity of the item is 1, the item is removed from the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      product - : the product of the item to increase the quantity of
      Throws:
      Exception - if the given product is null or if the given quantity is null or negative

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Empties the shopping cart. All items are removed from the shopping cart items list, numberOfItems and total are reset to '0'.

    • purchase

      public void purchase() throws Exception
      Purchase the products in the shopping cart
      Throws:
      Exception - if the customer's information is invalid
      See Also:
      • CustomerFacade
      • CustomerOrderFacade
      • ProductFacade
      • Product
      • Customer
      • CustomerOrder
      • CartItem
